info.name: Foodics Sandbox
info.description:
Foodics API (Application Programming Interface) is built around REST. The API allows external applications to integrate with Foodics on different levels to achieve various integrations goals

Foodics API returns `JSON-encoded` responses and uses standard HTTP response codes and authentication

Each endpoint has full description with sample responses

item.name: Addresses
item.description: Customers addresses that can be used for delivery orders
